lines: 1. Bugi'engoma twora n'echinguru,Yeso nache naende;'Bagendi goka, tera mochenge,Yeso nache naende.
2. Chisororo chiarw' as'ebitunwa,Yeso nache naende;Ngoch'ar'ere n'obonen' obonge,Yeso nache naende.
3. Ndirandigwe n'emerindo nyancha,Yeso nache naende;Rirandigw' as' abanto bonsi pi,Yeso nache naende.
4. Chiburuburu chiatworokirie,Yeso nache naende;Mechando yabeire 'nsinyo chionsi,Yeso nache naende.
5. 'Bisaku bionsi biabeanire,Yeso nache naende;Rora chisemi chiamentekire,Yeso nache naende.
